martin, the weaponsmaster.description: A large man wearing a full set of plate armor, save his helmet which he is carrying at his side.
martin, the weaponsmaster.response: Hello puny one, please help yourself to all of the armor and weapons in the room. You need to toughen up. Once you're geared up, you'll need to kill the rat scurrying around the room, and get the ticket from the chest beside me here, in order to get past Glorifa.
